content: *free for now * **designed for a single skein of rasta /yarns/library/malabrigo-yarn-rasta - charted and written instructions ** **i have added an extra file with with stitchcounts and chart for other yarn weights ** almond blossom is such a pretty colour but in my mind i think of it as sugared almonds so i picked this stitch to show it off it turns out that the stitches work beautifully with other more varied colourways as well quequay whales road etc mock cables - no cable needle required no extra bulk use less yarn
